body_html: Wellll it was kinda intended to be the main source of documentation for the extensions. We'll want some kind of official docs for them. Related docs seemed to follow a similar example-based style. In this case I also added the whole benchmarking story just to motivate why one would write a C++ extension.
body_text: Wellll it was kinda intended to be the main source of documentation for the extensions. We'll want some kind of official docs for them. Related docs seemed to follow a similar example-based style. In this case I also added the whole benchmarking story just to motivate why one would write a C++ extension.
body: Wellll it was kinda intended to be the main source of documentation for the extensions. We'll want some kind of official docs for them. [Related docs](https://www.tensorflow.org/extend/adding_an_op) seemed to follow a similar example-based style. In this case I also added the whole benchmarking story just to motivate why one would write a C++ extension.
